abstract_summ: An outbreak in Wuhan, China in late 2019 of a highly infectious new coronary pneumonia (COVID-19) led to the imposition of countrywide confinement measures from January to March 2020 . Five hundred and fifty-five undergraduate students were recruited from Hebei Agricultural University in Baoding, China . Increases in negative affect and symptoms of anxiety and depression (p-values < 0.001) were observed after 2 weeks of confinement .
